data.eml:eml: Annotated checklist of earthworm species described by András Zicsi (Clitellata: Megadrili)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Csuzdi, Csaba, Szederjesi, Tímea, Sherlock, Emma (2018): Annotated checklist of earthworm species described by András Zicsi (Clitellata: Megadrili). Zootaxa 4496 (1): 11-42, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4496.1.4
